headline: Are Dollar Tree (DLTR) Shares Getting Ahead Of Themselves After A 94% One-Year Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Dollar Tree's current share price offers good value or is running ahead of itself, you are not alone. The stock closed at US$139.95, with returns of 5.7% over 7 days, 9.0% over 30 days, 9.6% year to date, and 94.2% over the past year, while the 3 year return is negative 5.3% and the 5 year return is 29.7%. These moves have put Dollar Tree back on many investors' radar, especially given how sharply sentiment can shift in retail. Recent headlines have focused on...
